Name: Anduin
Tributary: Rhimdath (RI066), Gladden (RI031), Celebrant (RI014), Limlight (RI049), Entwash (RI085), Morgulduin (RI056), Erui (RI023), Sirith (RI077), Poros (RI064)
English: Great River; Great River of Wilderland

Name: Baranduin
Tributary: The Water (RI080), Shirebourn (RI073), Withywindle (RI083), Norbourn (RI062), Stock-brook (RI093)

Name: Nimrodel (river)
Comments: Water from this stream is said to be "healing to the weary"

Name: Gwathló
Sindarin: Gwathló ("Shadowy river from the fens"); Gwathir ("River of Shadow")

Name: Lhûn
Sindarin: Lhûn (not valid Sindarin); Sîr Luin ("Blue River")

Name: Sirannon
Comments: Dammed prior to the War of the Ring and became a foul lake; presumably cleansed during the Fourth Age
